original_text: So the Lord let some of the Canaanite nations continue to live in the land. He did not chase them all away. He did not put them all under Joshua's power.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그 이방 민족들을 머물러 두사 그들을 속히 쫓아내지 아니하셨으며 여호수아의 손에 넘겨 주지 아니하셨더라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord let some of the Canaanite nations continue to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여호와께서는 가나안 족속 중 일부가 계속 살도록 허락하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He did not chase them all away
He did not put them all
